definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: :De 23:14 peg, pin (NH id.; Ar. watidun)—[[יׇתֵד]] De 23:14 + 9 t.; cstr. [[יְתַד]] Ju Jdg 4:21, Jdg 16:14 (where c. art. but v. Ges:§ 127, R. 4 a); pl. [[יְתֵדׂת]] Ex 38:20; cstr. [[יִתְדׂת]] Ex 27:19 + 4 t.; sf. [[וִיתֵידׂתַיִח]] Is 54:2; [[יְתֵדׂתָיו]] Ex 27:19, Is 33:20; [[וִיתֵדׂתֶיהָ]] Ex 39:40; [[וִיתֵדׂתָם]] Nu 3:37, Nu 4:32; —pin, peg, esp.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: tent-pin Ju Jdg 5:26, Jdg 4:21; [[יְתַד]] [[הָאׂהֶל]] v:Jdg 4:22; rd. perh. also Job 4:21 (fig.; cf. II. [[יֶתֶר]]); oft. of tabernacle Ex 27:19, Ex 27:19, Ex 35:18, Ex 35:18, Ex 38:20, Ex 38:31, Ex 38:21; ‖[[מֵיתָרָיו]] Ex 39:40, cf. Nu 3:37, Nu 4:32 (all P); of Zion under fig. of tent Is 33:20, Is 54:2; fig. of ruler as support of state Zec 10:4.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: a peg for hanging Ez Eze 15:3; so fig. of Eliakim Is 22:23, Is 22:24; of secure position Ezr 9:8 (cf. Ar., v. Thes Hi Hariri:361 Der., 30bt 0l0’awta0di of a king).

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: the pin or stick used in beating up the woof in the loom Ju Jdg 16:14 a, vid. GFM:PAOS, Oct. 1889, clxxvi. ff.; in [[היתד הּארג]] v:b, del [[היתד]] (Id:ib and in comm. ad loc.)
